Class FileChooserServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • FileChooserServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class FileChooserServer
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Since:
    1.0 Handles behaviors for the server side of the File Chooser. Many methods and variables were taken from Java How To Program (Early Objects) (10th Edition) example fig28_03_06.
    Author:
    David Hausken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                 throws java.io.IOException

      • processConnection

        private void processConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Process connection with client. This is where the server reads in the file and displays the contents. Credit given to the book for some of the code.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Failed to transmit the data correctly

      • closeConnection

        private void closeConnection()
        Close streams and socket. Credit given to the book for the code.

        Parameters:
        message - Desired message to send to the client.

      • setTextFieldEditable

        private void setTextFieldEditable(boolean editable)
        Manipulates enterField in the event-dispatch thread. Credit given to the book for the method.
        Parameters:
        editable - Whether or not the text field can be edited.

      • fileToString

        private java.lang.String fileToString(java.io.File fileName)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Converts a file to a String.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file. Should be the path to the file.
        Returns:
        String representing the contents of the text file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error with the buffered reader reading the file.
